hero.title: WITM
hero.subtitle: Who Is The Most...?
hero.description: The party game that reveals what your friends really think! Vote on fun questions, discover surprising truths, and dare the winners. Quick to start, impossible to forget.

about.title: A Small Swiss Team, Big Ideas
about.description: We're a passionate team from Fribourg, Switzerland, dedicated to bringing friends together through fun and unforgettable moments.
about.story: WITM was born from a simple question: "Who among us is the most likely to...?" Now you can settle the debate! Create a room, invite your friends with a PIN code, and vote on hilarious questions. The one with the most votes? They get a dare!

createRooms.title: Quick Room Setup
createRooms.description: Create a room in seconds and share a 3-digit PIN. Friends join instantly - no accounts needed!

funQuiz.title: Vote on Friends
funQuiz.description: Fun questions like "Who is the most likely to..." appear. Everyone votes secretly for who fits best!

dynamicVoting.title: Reveal & Dare
dynamicVoting.description: See who got the most votes! The winner gets a fun dare or challenge from the group.

leaderboard.title: Final Rankings
leaderboard.description: At the end, discover who was voted "The Most" throughout the game. Bragging rights included!

features.sectionDescription: Choose your vibe! Each category brings a different flavor to your game night.

examples.sectionDescription: Here's a taste of what you'll vote on:
examples.q1: Most likely to plan a surprise party
examples.q2: Most likely to spend way too much money on coffee
examples.q3: Most likely to run away and join the circus
examples.q4: Most likely to be the messiest in the house
examples.q5: Most likely to quit their job in a dramatic way
examples.q6: Most likely to break into Area 51 just to see what's inside

carousel.sectionDescription: Swipe through the app and see how easy it is to play with friends.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose WITM?
whyChoose.subtitle: The party game made for real friendships
whyChoose.swissMadeDesc: Designed and developed with Swiss precision and care in Fribourg. Quality you can trust.
whyChoose.weListenDesc: Have an idea? We read every suggestion. Your feedback directly shapes our features.
whyChoose.justLaunchedDesc: Fresh out of the oven! Version 1.0 launched February 2026 - more fun coming soon.
whyChoose.communityFirstDesc: Built for friend groups, shaped by players like you. You are the heart of WITM.

feature1.title: Create or Join in Seconds
feature1.description: Starting a game is effortless. Create a room and get a unique 3-character PIN code. Share it with friends via text, and they're in! No sign-up required for guests.
feature1.bullet2: Minimum 2-3 players to start the fun

feature2.title: Vote Based on Capabilities
feature2.description: Users can vote for others based on their displayed capabilities in different areas like creativity, skill, and teamwork. The app allows users to assess and vote accordingly.
feature2.extra: With a dynamic voting system, users get the chance to vote based on the unique qualities that players showcase. Whether it's a game challenge, a task, or a creative project, the community votes to highlight the best performances.

feature3.title: Vote for Who Fits Best
feature3.description: Each round, a question appears: "Who is the most likely to...?" Everyone votes secretly for the friend they think matches best. Be honest... or be strategic!
feature3.bullet2: Optional anonymous mode hides who voted for whom
feature3.bullet3: Self-vote toggle for even more fun

feature4.title: Real-Time Voting & Feedback
feature4.description: Players can receive real-time feedback based on votes and participate in ongoing challenges, helping them improve and advance faster.
feature4.extra: With live updates, users are instantly notified of votes they've received, and the ability to give feedback on others' performances fosters a supportive community.

feature5.title: Results & Dares
feature5.description: After voting, the results are revealed! The person with the most votes is crowned "The Most" for that round and receives a dare or fun challenge from the group.
feature5.extra: The game automatically advances after each round. Configure 5 to 20 questions per game, with timers from 5 to 30 seconds. Every setting is customizable!

feature6.title: Community and Social Sharing
feature6.description: Players can share their achievements, votes received, and challenge results with their community, allowing them to show off their progress.
feature6.extra: Social integration lets users share their voting history and leaderboard positions on various social media platforms, enabling them to increase visibility and celebrate achievements.

feature7.title: Final Leaderboard
feature7.description: At the end, see the complete leaderboard showing who was voted "The Most" across all rounds. Perfect for settling friendly debates and earning bragging rights!
feature7.extra: Premium players can create custom questions, access all categories, and personalize every game setting. Make WITM truly yours!

download.title: Ready to Play?
download.description: Download WITM now and discover what your friends really think. Available free on iOS and Android!

feedback.title: Got ideas? We're all ears!
feedback.description: We love hearing from our players. Share your thoughts, suggest new questions, or just say hello. Every message helps us make WITM better!
